tasks_completed.description: Verified zero OpenWeatherMap references using case-insensitive grep
tasks_completed.rationale: Case-insensitive grep ensures all variants (openweathermap, OpenWeatherMap, etc.) are eliminated

git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: grep 'openweathermap' (lowercase) missed 'OpenWeatherMap' (capital W) in section headers
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Used exact string replacement for capital OpenWeatherMap, verified with case-insensitive grep -ri

dev.qa_notes: Run case-insensitive grep: 'grep -ri openweathermap .claude/agents/' should return 0 matches. All 3 section headers now use 'weather skill' instead of 'OpenWeatherMap'.

recommendations: Always use case-insensitive grep (-i flag) when searching for brand names or proper nouns
Consider creating a validation script that checks for multiple case variants of deprecated names
